turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I'm looking to order four pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can help place the order for you, does that sound good?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what kind of pizzas did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking for four small pizzas, two pepperoni and two chicken Alfredo, all of them thin-crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it doesn't look like bella luna has chicken alfredo. sorry. did you want another topping?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they still have a chicken as a topping or just not the chicken Alfredo?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they don't have alfredo sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Can I get Instead of the chicken Alfredo then, can I get two pizzas with chicken and bacon on them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said 4 small pizzas, 2 pepperoni and 2 chicken and bacon, all with thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $49.84 is the total for this order. did you want to place the order for pick up, or delivery.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's pretty expensive, but we'll go with delivery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, if you want it delivered it'll be an additional $15.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that alright?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can we just do pick-up instead, then?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, pick up it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it'll be ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. Nah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, take care.
